languages.text: {n}Сестра стряхивается, будто выныривая из забытья.{/n} "О планете... месте... не важно! Я знаю этих еретиков — однажды я сражалась с ними, и была тяжело ранена. Но клянусь — я никогда не оборачивалась к ним спиной и не бежала!"

{n}She snaps out of it, as if emerging from a reverie.{/n} "A planet... a place... It doesn't matter! I know these heretics — I fought them and was gravely wounded. But I swear — I never turned from them and ran!"
languages.original_text: {n}Сестра стряхивается, будто выныривая из забытья.{/n} "О планете... месте... не важно! Я знаю этих еретиков — однажды я сражалась с ними, и была тяжело ранена. Но клянусь — я никогда не оборачивалась к ним спиной и не бежала!"

traits.locale_text: {n}She snaps out of it, as if emerging from a reverie.{/n} "About a planet... a place... it doesn't matter! I know these heretics — I fought them and was gravely wounded. But I swear — I never turned away from them and ran!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}她猛地清醒过来，仿佛从深思中回过神一样。{/n}“那只是颗行星……是某个地方罢了……这并不重要！我认识这些异端分子！我曾与他们交战过，而且受了重伤，但我发誓，我从来没临阵脱逃过！”
languages.original_text: {n}She snaps out of it, as if emerging from a reverie.{/n} "A planet... a place... It doesn't matter! I know these heretics — I fought them and was gravely wounded. But I swear — I never turned from them and ran!"

traits.locale_text: {n}她猛地清醒过来，仿佛从深思中回过神一样。{/n}“那只是颗行星……是某个地方罢了……这并不重要！我认识这些异端分子！我曾与他们交战过，而且受了重伤，但我发誓，我从来没临阵脱逃过！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Espabila, como si despertara de una ensoñación.{/n} «De un planeta... un lugar... ¡no importa! Conozco a estos herejes, luché contra ellos y quedé gravemente herida. ¡Pero juro que nunca les di la espalda para huir!».
languages.original_text: {n}She snaps out of it, as if emerging from a reverie.{/n} "A planet... a place... It doesn't matter! I know these heretics — I fought them and was gravely wounded. But I swear — I never turned from them and ran!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Espabila, como si despertara de una ensoñación.{/n} «De un planeta... un lugar... ¡no importa! Conozco a estos herejes, luché contra ellos y quedé gravemente herida. ¡Pero juro que nunca les di la espalda para huir!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼女はまるで夢から覚めたかのように目を見開いた。{/n}「惑星…場所…そんなことはどうでもいい！我は異端者たちと戦い、重傷を負った。だが、誓って、我は奴らから背を向けて逃げたりはしなかった！」
languages.original_text: {n}She snaps out of it, as if emerging from a reverie.{/n} "A planet... a place... It doesn't matter! I know these heretics — I fought them and was gravely wounded. But I swear — I never turned from them and ran!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女はまるで夢から覚めたかのように目を見開いた。{/n}「惑星…場所…そんなことはどうでもいい！我は異端者たちと戦い、重傷を負った。だが、誓って、我は奴らから背を向けて逃げたりはしなかった！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sie kommt zu sich wie aus einem Tagtraum.{/n} "Ein Planet ... ein Ort ... es spielt keine Rolle! Ich kenne diese Ketzer – ich habe sie bekämpft und wurde schwer verwundet. Aber ich schwöre – ich habe niemals die Flucht vor ihnen ergriffen!"
languages.original_text: {n}She snaps out of it, as if emerging from a reverie.{/n} "A planet... a place... It doesn't matter! I know these heretics — I fought them and was gravely wounded. But I swear — I never turned from them and ran!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie kommt zu sich wie aus einem Tagtraum.{/n} "Ein Planet ... ein Ort ... es spielt keine Rolle! Ich kenne diese Ketzer – ich habe sie bekämpft und wurde schwer verwundet. Aber ich schwöre – ich habe niemals die Flucht vor ihnen ergriffen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Elle se ressaisit, comme si elle sortait d'un rêve éveillé.{/n} « Une planète... Un endroit où... Peu importe ! Je connais ces hérétiques. Et j'ai été gravement blessée en les affrontant, mais je jure que je n'ai jamais pris la fuite face à eux ! »
languages.original_text: {n}She snaps out of it, as if emerging from a reverie.{/n} "A planet... a place... It doesn't matter! I know these heretics — I fought them and was gravely wounded. But I swear — I never turned from them and ran!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle se ressaisit, comme si elle sortait d'un rêve éveillé.{/n} « Une planète... Un endroit où... Peu importe ! Je connais ces hérétiques. Et j'ai été gravement blessée en les affrontant, mais je jure que je n'ai jamais pris la fuite face à eux ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, hülyalara dalıp gitmiş gibi... Bir anda silkelenip kendine geliyor.{/n} "Bir gezegen... Bir yer... Ancak önemi yok! Bu kâfirlerin içini bilirim ben! Onlarla savaşıp ağır yara aldım ancak asla ama asla arkamı dönüp kaçmadım!"
languages.original_text: {n}She snaps out of it, as if emerging from a reverie.{/n} "A planet... a place... It doesn't matter! I know these heretics — I fought them and was gravely wounded. But I swear — I never turned from them and ran!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, hülyalara dalıp gitmiş gibi… Bir anda silkelenip kendine geliyor.{/n} "Bir gezegen… Bir yer… Ancak önemi yok! Bu kâfirlerin içini bilirim ben! Onlarla savaşıp ağır yara aldım ancak asla ama asla arkamı dönüp kaçmadım!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
